member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC
member.summary: Stencil operations that can be performed based on the results of stencil test.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilFailOp
member.summary: The stencil operation to perform when stencil testing fails.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilDepthFailOp
member.summary: The stencil operation to perform when stencil testing passes and depth testing fails.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilPassOp
member.summary: The stencil operation to perform when stencil testing and depth testing both pass.

member.name: D3D11_DEPTH_STENCILOP_DESC.StencilFunc
member.summary: A function that compares stencil data against existing stencil data. The function options are listed in .
